title: Viking Britain
itunes:title: Viking Britain
itunes:subtitle: We speak to Thomas Williams of the British Museum about his new book Viking Britain: An Exploration, which offers a fresh take on several centuries of Viking invasions and rule in Britain
description:
We speak to Thomas Williams of the British Museum about his new book Viking Britain: An Exploration, which offers a fresh take on several centuries of Viking invasions and rule in Britain

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
